name: fisiorag-monorepo
description: Sistema RAG Agentico Multi-Tenant per la Fisioterapia - Monorepo Configuration

scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: uv run ruff check . && uv run mypy .
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:fix:backend && pnpm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run black .
scripts.format: pnpm run format:backend && pnpm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: uv run black . && uv run isort .
scripts.type-check: pnpm run type-check:backend && pnpm run type-check:frontend
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:backend && pnpm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: pnpm --filter frontend clean && pnpm store prune
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm lint:fix && pnpm type-check && pnpm test
scripts.ci: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm lint && pnpm type-check && pnpm test && pnpm build

author: FisioRAG Team
